list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a gregarious Eurasian crow with black plumage and a bare face, nesting in colonies in treetops.

a chess piece, typically with its top in the shape of a battlement, that can move in any direction along a rank or file on which it stands. Each player starts the game with two rooks at opposite ends of the first rank.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: police files are overflowing with complaints from people who've been rooked
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các tập tin của cảnh sát đang tràn ngập những lời phàn nàn từ những người đã được tân binh
